definitions.definition: To watch; to observe without participating.
definitions.example: My performance seems somehow always to get worse when there are other people looking on.

definitions.definition: To think of something in a particular way.
definitions.example: I look on him not as a boss, but as a friend.

definitions.definition: (usually negative) To approve or to be accepting of something.
definitions.example: We don't look kindly on people like you.
